channel.title: Help picking a forum hoster
channel.description: Well Im trying to start a gaming community and im not sure which forum hoster i should use. The only 2 i know about are Smfforfree and Invisionfree so which one should i pick? Or are there any other ones i dont know about?

item.title: Help picking a forum hoster
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

DNS = Domain Name Server.
Search for vBulletin on Moparisthebest search form, I got mine here on 3rd Party Programs.

Read full topic

item.title: Help picking a forum hoster
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

Sorry if this is a stupid question but is a DNS the same thing as a domain? Just making sure i know what your talking about. Also do you have a like to the vb forum? I looked on google but could not find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help picking a forum hoster
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

None.

Buy a host and point the DNS to either, or get vB or IPB and put it on your server.

About $6 per month, not that much.

Read full topic
